title: ennaDu nee krupa
sahitya:
,,,, ,,ennaDu | 



nee krupa kalgu- ||



nO inakula | 



tilaka nannu rakshim cu- ||



Daku ennaDu | 



nee ... ||







anupallavi







,,,, ,,pannaga sha- | 



yana ... ||



,,,, ,,pannaga sha- | 



yana patita paava- ||



na baanu kula | 



deepa bhavanaasha- ||



na (ennaDu) ||







caraNam







,,,, ,,kanna taNDri | 



naapai karuNimca- ||



mani kannavaari | 



ninna aashrayimci- ||



tivi nannu neranammi | 



yunna vaaDE ||



neetO vinnavimcu koNDi | 



venkatEsha naa- ||



tO (ennaDu) ||
